title: Marriage certificate and ad for lost kids - claim

content.question: Which of the following claims can most accurately be made based on the two sources?

choices.label: Despite enslavement, African Americans were able to maintain constant contact with family members.
Traditional marriages were uncommon among African Americans in the period after the Civil War.
After the Civil War, African Americans worked to build family bonds that had been disrupted by enslavement.
Enslavers typically encouraged the development of strong family ties among the people they enslaved.

content.answer: After the Civil War, African Americans worked to build family bonds that had been disrupted by enslavement.
